meta.hint: Use who to ask about a person. example Who saw the bird first? Use what to ask about a thing. example What do birds eat? Use when to ask about a time. example When do birds sleep? Use where to ask about a place. example Where is the bird's nest? Use why to ask for a reason. example Why do birds sing?
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the best question word?

content.word: Hannah will come to the picnic.
content.description: Which sentence tells you about the future?
content.extra: He played well, Hannah will come to the picnic.

content.description: Which sentence tells you about the future?
content.extra: I will draw a sketch,  She worked very hard for the exams.
